Title: The Bullet Proof Manager
Summary: A monthly business incubator where leaders grow their skills, exchange ideas and share best practices.
Benefits: Improve the effectiveness of a Manager, using a Proven Methodology
Point1: Addresses 10 critical core competencies of a managerial leader
Point2: Optimise learning √ê half day monthly workshops over 12 months
Point3: Performance monitoring, Return on Investment (R.O.I.) review & followup coaching
Details:
For over 25 years, Crestcom® has trained over 1 million managers in over 60 countries to produce real business results through people.

Crestom®, the world’s leader in management training surveyed 1,739 “real world” Managing Directors, CEOs and Presidents of organisations and discovered the
10 “real world” skills most desirable in their managers:

Ability to motivate others
Communication
Customer service
Performance management
Planning and goal setting
Recruiting, hiring and retention
Coaching and mentoring
Stress management
Negotiation
Change management


Participants can enroll into The Bullet Proof Manager programme any time and attend one monthly session for 12 consecutive months.  Each monthly workshop is four and half hours and focuses on two management or leadership skills.  At the completion of the training, participating managers will have spent at least 48 hours in a structured learning environment, exchanging ideas with managers from different organization, different industries, background and experiences.

Title: Nanyang-Wharton Senior Leaders Programme
CompanyName: Nanyang Tecnological University - Nanyang Business School, Open Enrolment Programmes
Summary: An intensive 11 days full-time programme conducted in Singapore and Philadephia, USA; 6 days in NTU and 5 days in Wharton.
Benefits: Allow highly accomplished senior executives to learn how to challenge their assumptions and transform their organizations into innovative result driven enterprise.
Point1: Assess and re-assess the internal and external environments of their organizatio
Point2: Stay vigilant to identify opportunities and threats ahead of your competitors
Point3: Gather best practices and lessons learnt that will ensure the sustainable growth
Details:
Program Overview

The Aresty Institute of Executive Education at the Wharton School and Nanyang Business School have formed a powerful alliance spanning two continents to offer top business leaders a global leadership program. The Nanyang-Wharton Senior Leaders Program is designed for highly accomplished senior executives who want to challenge their assumptions and transform their organizations into innovative, result-driven enterprises.

Structure

This two-segment program runs for one week each in Nanyang Business School, Singapore, and the Wharton School, Philadelphia, USA.

Segement at Nanyang Business School (23-28 March, 2015)
  • Managing Change
  • Valuing the Organization
  • Developing a Global Strategy

Segment at the Wharton School (24-28 August, 2015)
  • Strategic Thinking
  • Innovation for Competitive Advantage

Who should Attend

This programme is designed for experienced senior executives in leadership position with at least 8 years of leadership experiences. We seek a diverse class from across different professions and cultures so that you will maxmize your learning.

Program Fee

The program fee is S$ 26,000 per participant (excludes prevailing taxes). This covers the cost of all course materials and meals when classes are in session and accomodation for the study visit to the Wharton School in Philadelphia. All other expenses, including accomodation in Singpaore, travel and person expenses, will be borne by the participant.

For more information, please visit: www.nwamp.ntu.edu.sg

Email: amp@ntu.edu.sg

Tel: +65 6592-3799

Title: Effective Negotiation & Persuasion Skills
Summary: The importance of successful negotiation cannot be overstated in a competitive business world. Possessing negotiation skills is essential in getting results.
Benefits: To be equipped with practical negotiation skills to gain business edge and help build longer term results
Point2: Adopt the right interpersonal skills and attitude during negotiation
Point3: Persuade and influence to achieve business results
Details:
Introduction
 
In today’s business climate, the importance of successful negotiation cannot be overstated. Organization negotiates every day; equipping your team with practical negotiation skills gives them the edge as well as helps them build longer term results. Effective negotiators are not born ? they can be made ? and this workshop is designed to jump start a participant firmly on the road to mastery for effective negotiation and persuasion skills.
 
Workshop Objectives
 
At the end of the workshop, participants will be able to:
  • Use effective strategies to negotiate
  • Adopt the right interpersonal skills and attitude during negotiation
  • Persuade and influence to achieve business results
 
Workshop Outline/Content
 
Module 1:  Effective Negotiation
  1. Basic concepts of Negotiation
  2. A framework for the negotiation process
  3. The difference between position and interest negotiation
  4. Identifying and prioritizing your interests
  5. Planning and Preparation – getting the facts and setting the objectives
  6. Listening skills and body language
  7. Questioning techniques
  8. Extracting and Granting Concessions
  9. Generating and evaluating possible options
  10. Identifying your ideal outcome 
  11. Handling tough negotiation situations
 
Module 2:  Persuasion Skills
  1. A study of human nature and behavior as a foundation for Persuasion and Influencing skills
  2. Persuasion and Influence
  3. The Persuasion Foundation
  4. Mental Triggers (Also known as Laws of Persuasion)
  5. Source of Power
  6. Key Facts for Persuasion
  7. Commitments
  8. Code of Influence
  9. Language Patterns
 
Methodology
 
The Workshop will be activity-based and interactive with experiential and accelerated learning. Activities, videos, case studies and role plays will be used to bring across pertinent learning points. Participants will be fully engaged for optimal learning and maximum results.
 
Duration
 
2 Days (16 Hours)


ODC Website
http://www.odctraining.com.sg

Title: Sales Booster Package
Summary: Quality workshops packaged for learning effectiveness and cost efficiency
Benefits: Equip Sales and Business Development Professionals with effective sales presentation and negotiation skills
Point1: Learn to make powerful presentation to gain sales
Point2: Learn to negotiate and persuade effectively
Point3: Acquire skills to gain long term results
Details:
This learning package consists of two pouplar programs: - 'Powerful Sales Presentation' and 'Effective Negotiation & Persuasion Skills'.

OVERVIEW OF POWERFUL SALES PRESENTATION

In the age of ''Wow!'' marketing and advertising, it's important to make your presentation unique and audience focused. Generic speeches and snazzy PowerPoint slides just don't cut it anymore -- especially with savvy corporate customers. This 2-day workshop is specially designed for your Sales Consultants to  enable them to structure, script, and persuasively deliver sales presentations that will position them ahead of the competition. At the end of the workshop, they will be able to deliver powerful, professional, polished presentations effectively

Upcoming Program Dates : 25 – 26 Aug | 27 – 28 Oct

OVERVIEW OF NEGOTIATION & PERSUASION SKILLS

In today’s business climate, the importance of successful negotiation cannot be overstated. Organization negotiates every day. It is essential to equip your team members with practical negotiation skills to give them the edge as well as help them build longer term results.

Effective negotiators are not born ? they can be made ? and this 2-day workshop is designed to jump start a participant firmly on the road to mastery for effective negotiation and persuasion skills.

Upcoming Program Date : 7 – 8 Oct
                                                  
Ususal course fees = $1200                   
Package fees = $900

Title: Partners in Leadership's Oz Principle Self Track Accountability Leadership Training
Summary: Achieving Key Organizational Results Through Greater Individual and Organizational Accountability
Benefits: To help participants learn how to take greater personal accountability for achieving Key Organizational Results, in spite of difficult circumstances and challenging obstacles.
Point1: ¬•	Clarify Key Organizational Results, align people's daily work objectives with
Point2: ¬•	Introduce a positive approach to creating greater accountability throughout th
Point3: ¬•	Create greater ownership for achieving Key Results by using the Steps to Accou
Details:
Sign up now for the Self track Accountability Training based on The Oz Principle, the #1 Leadership Book on the New York Times.

$1085 per person
$885 for early bird registration by October 7th
Additional 15% for groups of 2 or more
Only for the first 5 who register and make payment: $750 per person and receive the #1 Leadership Book on the New York Times: How did that Happen by Roger Connors and Tom Smith (softback). (Price code: HRMF51114)
To register, email your full name, email address and contact number to lizk@glidespartners.com.
Go to www.glidespartners.com and http://www.ozprinciple.com/services/accountability/ for more information.

ACCOUNTABILITY IS THE ANSWER
Partners in Leadership is the premier provider of Leadership and Workplace Accountability Training services. Their comprehensive research shows that a lack of personal accountability for achieving organizational results is a common organizational challenge. The Self Track Training™ is based on the Oz Principle®. It provides a proven and powerful methodology for helping people at every level of the organization take greater personal accountability for overcoming the obstacles they face and asking "What else can I do?" to achieve key organizational results.

OBJECTIVES OF THE TRAINING
• Clarify Key Organizational Results, align people's daily work objectives with those results.
• Introduce a positive approach to creating greater accountability throughout the organization.
• Create greater ownership for achieving Key Results by using the Steps to Accountability.
• Learn how to apply tools and practices to accelerate greater accountability, individually and organizationally.
• Develop specific action steps using Accountability Plans for Creating A Culture Of Accountability and achieving the desired results.

WHO SHOULD ATTEND
Anyone accountable to delivering key results and key initiatives for a team and business including Executives, Team and Project Leaders working across teams, Management, Senior Management and Directors of Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) as well as Multinational Corporations (MNCs)

WHAT PARTICIPANTS RECEIVE
In addition to the Oz Principle Accountability Training workbook and tools, participants will also receive a the New York Times bestselling book, The Oz Principle (softback). Included is the 45-day subscription to PILtools - the online training and retention tool.

THE FACILITORS
Henry Lee and Alex Butt are the Managing Partners of Glides Consulting Partners and are the Certified Facilitators for this Accountability Training. Alex and Henry have a combined span of 49 years of corporate experience. For detailed profiles, go to http://glidespartners.com/about-us/our-people/

TO REGISTER
Email lizk@glidespartners.com with the following details: Full name*, Contact* and Email*, Country*, Organization, Designation. Email info@glidespartners.com for enquiries or call Elizabeth Khong at +5 97849579.

Title: Workforce Productivity Analytics 2-day workshop
CompanyName: HCMI SEA and Pacific Sdn Bhd (Human Capital Management Institute)
Summary: Intensive 2 day workshop on Workforce Productivity Analytics, facilitated by Mr. Jeff Higgins, a recognised expert in workforce analytics and workforce planning across multiple industries.
Certification: Workforce Productivity Analytics certified by HCMI
Benefits: You will be able to quantify and measure workforce productivity and ROI, and also walk away with a set of practical tools and templates that can be immediately implemented in the workplace!
Point1: identify areas on how to improve your workforce productivity
Point2: analyse trends of your organisation's ROI on human capital investments
Point3: enable HR professionals to project and quantify the future cost of HR and workfo
Details:
Key Questions Answered:
  • How do you quantify the impact human capital has on financial performance?
  • How do human capital metrics integrate with commonly accepted financial metrics?
  • How do you measure total workforce costs to drive workforce effectiveness and efficiency?
  • How do you quantify value creation in the organization across the talent management life cycle?
  • What is the impact of training on profit, productivity and total human capital value?
  • What is the differential human capital value creation of different job roles?
  • How do you measure workforce flow, changes, and growth like a cash flow statement?
Course Testimonial:
  • “A good venue to increase the credibility of HR in the business world.” ~ FMCG company
  • “This course is a ‘must’ for HRnprofessionals. The ability to ‘manage by fact’ is a key competency, not only for business units, but also for HR practitioners.” ~ Senior Vice President, HR, OCBC
  • “Jeff Higgins is the most knowledgeable speaker I have ever heard on the topic of HR Analytics. He has brilliantly organized a wealth of material and present it in a very easy to understand manner. Anyone who is going into this field should take this course. He is helping to change the field of human resources into a business imperative.” ~John McLaughlin, Human Capital Mgmt
